headline: A Vinyl Bar in Shibuya
overview: Engineered 3 interactive, high-fidelity prototypes (voice switching, image-to-song, and AI-driven features), validating concepts through user interviews and data-informed design. Conducted strategic AI music market analysis and created user journey maps using scenario-based design, directly shaping product roadmap and competitive positioning.
buildNotes: Engineered 3 interactive, high-fidelity prototypes with AI-driven features
Conducted 25+ user interviews and data-informed design validation
Created strategic AI music market analysis and competitive positioning
Developed user journey maps using scenario-based design methodology

body.raw:
# Innovating Music Discovery in Tokyo's Vinyl Scene

A Vinyl Bar in Shibuya represents the intersection of traditional vinyl culture and cutting-edge AI technology. As a Product and Engineering Intern, I focused on developing innovative prototypes that enhance music discovery through voice interaction, image recognition, and AI-driven personalization while preserving the authentic vinyl bar experience.
